tweet:
The Trump Administration made a woefully inadequate request for Census Bureau funding, but Congress wisely ensured that the agency received needed funding.

With the 2020 Census price tag at $15.6B, it is vital that Congress continues to fully fund a complete and accurate census.

From determining Congressional representation to allocation of federal resources, the census plays a vital role in our democracy and economy.

But the upcoming 2020 Census faces obstacles that could prevent an accurate count.

More in our new report: https://medium.com/@HouseBudgetDems/these-are-our-numbers-the-importance-of-the-2020-census-7b8fd5d7e802 …

.@RepJayapal: Has the #GOPTaxScam paid for itself?

CBO Director Keith Hall: No.
.@RepHorsford: In addition to impacting the economy, the #TrumpShutdown impacted thousands of federal employees who were furloughed or forced to work without pay in my state of Nevada.

Rep. @rosadelauro: The Trump Admin has repeatedly taken steps to sabotage health care, causing premiums to skyrocket.

CBO Director Keith Hall: We do expect enrollment in ACA exchange plans to drop in 2019 due to provisions in the 2017 tax bill.

#GOPTaxScam

Chairman @RepJohnYarmuth: As Chairman of this committee, I hope to return us to a sustainable fiscal trajectory. Doing so will require smarter use of the nation's fiscal resources - without harming seniors' retirement security or imposing more burdens on struggling families.

Chairman @RepJohnYarmuth: In last year’s report, CBO put the cost of the tax law at $1.9 trillion over 10 years. Now Republicans are calling for cuts to Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid to pay for these tax windfalls for wealthy investors and CEOs.

Chairman @RepJohnYarmuth: The State of our Union is unsustainable, and we’re facing this bleak fiscal reality because this president and so-called fiscal conservatives chose to squander our nation’s wealth and solvency to give tax cuts to millionaires. #GOPTaxScam

NEW: President Trump's own economic advisor says an extended #TrumpShutdown could cause serious damage to the U.S. economy. It's time for the President and Senate Republicans to #EndTheShutdown, now. https://twitter.com/CNNnewsroom/status/1088081750344040449 …

Democrats support smart, effective border security solutions. A discussion on border security is no reason for President Trump to close part of the govt. The #TrumpShutdown is a disaster for furloughed employees, public safety, and small businesses.

House Democrats voted to reopen the government. It's time for Republicans to step up and help end the #TrumpShutdown.

By halting activities at the Department of Justice, Environmental Protection Agency, and FDA, the #TrumpShutdown is making our nation less safe.
Law enforcement activities and civil prosecution, environmental safeguards and chemical management, and public health are all at risk.

The #TrumpShutdown is now in its 19th day. That means for 19 days, 420,000 federal employees have been working without pay and another 400,000 have been furloughed.
